room_title: Escape room "It’s Alive!" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
review: When I entered The Escape Room Zone, I was greeted by Sean and Little Will who were very friendly and answered all of my questions that I had. I had a lot of fun in the mad scientist room (though I was unable to finish) and will be coming back again!

room_title: Escape room "It’s Alive!" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
review: My friends and I did the Mad Scientist room. We found it to be very challenging yet solvable and fun, provoking team work during the process. The staff is great! Kyle and Javon were very helpful and gave subtle clues. I will definitely be returning to try the rest of the rooms!

room_title: Escape room "It’s Alive!" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
review: We played the Mad Scientist room with 9 of us and we had a blast! I would highly recommend giving it a try! So much fun and more difficult and well put together than I thought it would be! A special thanks to Sean for handling our booking! Can't wait to go back!
